Agenda

This is a preliminary agenda. More details will be added, some changes will happen.

Friday April 8th

Venue: The canteen in Nydalen (Sandakerveien 140, Oslo)

13:30 - 14:40: Inspirational speeches
14:40 - 15:30: Idea pitching. 60 sec per idea.
15:30 - 16:00: Voting and group forming
16:00 - 18:30: Playing Lean

Monday April 11th

Venue: DOGA, Hausmanns gate 16, 0182 Oslo

08:00: Information and breakfast
08:20: Kickstart! Introduction by Benjamin Sommer
11:45: Check in. Status update from each group.
12:00: Lunch
12:30: A Zen Break: "To boost your creative energy", 20 mins
14:00 - 16:00: Mentor sessions. Present and get feedback.
17:00: Dinner
17:00 - 23:00: DOGA is still open, stay as long as you like.

Tuesday April 12th

Venue: DOGA, Hausmanns gate 16, 0182 Oslo

08:00: DOGA opens. Breakfast is being served
08:20: Kick start and Check in.
11:00: Lunch
11:30 - 13:00: Pitch training. Book time with mentors.
14:45: Food
15:15: Stop working! Welcome to the competition.
15:30: Groups start presenting their work. 3 minutes per group.
16:30: Break. The jury decides on a winner.
17:00: Winners are announced
18:00: End of event. Go to Crow Bar for a beer or two!
